channel.title: Anon connection wizzard
channel.description: Hello. How anon connection guide works ? Where does it gets obfs4 proxy settings, does it go in background mode to bridges.torproject.org and get the proxy ? I think anon connection wizzard conenct to some website and get the list of obfs4 ip's. Does it connect to it using my real ip or it use direct connection to Tor to get obfs4 ip's ?

item.title: Anon connection wizzard
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Opeq:

Thanks Patrick. That means that anon connection wizard doesn’t need internet connection get the list of obfs3 or 4 IP’s ?

This is what I said.

Read full topic

item.title: Anon connection wizzard
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Opeq:

anon connection wizzard conenct to some website

No.

It’s built-in. Hard coded. See ACW source code.

Read full topic

item.title: Anon connection wizzard

Hello.
